metadata.name: Father-son time
metadata.description: father son time is one of the most important times that a man and his boy can have dad has to talk to his son about various aspects of the life weather itâ€™s politics, religion, love or something else this father and son time is essential the child knows that his dad is someone that he can always come to when he needs guidance or advice about something Survivor skill are something else that fishing teach son they teach the child how to fend for himself it also strengthens there bond altogether they become stronger as a  family unit nothing is more precious important than bonding with your child.
